The Shade of The Day of Judgement

Lecture at the At-Taqwa Mosque, Taman Tun Dr ismail, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia on 15th Dec 2012.

Podcast   /   The Shade of The Day of Judgement

Mufti Ismail Menk

Ismail ibn Musa Menk, also known as Mufti Menk, is a Muslim cleric and Grand Mufti of Zimbabwe.

#1 The Shade of The Day of Judgement

Who gets the shade on the day of judgement?
